pageContext.description: Cast marks down side. Sides of wings hammered into shallow diagonal grooves.
pageContext.other: the site description has the following elaboration(not really room in the box);,  between Kilifilland, Balcarry in a spot which had been a morass or loch,within a foot of each other in 1875. On a farm occupied by Mr Lilpen. South of Glenluce
pageContext.publications: Ayr and Wigton collections Vol II pp 8 and 9,  Evans p 98
